org.stanwood.podcaster.cliutils
Class MPlayer

java.lang.Object
  org.stanwood.podcaster.util.AbstractExecutable
      org.stanwood.podcaster.cliutils.MPlayer

public class MPlayer
extends AbstractExecutable

This class is a wrapper around the mplayer application and is used to drive mplayer in a more java friendly way

Method Detail

captureLiveAudioStream

public void captureLiveAudioStream(java.io.File wavOutputFile,
                                   StreamReference stream,
                                   long time)
                            throws MPlayerException
This will capture a audio stream from using mplayer for the given amount of time

Parameters:
wavOutputFile - The WAV file to create from the audio stream
stream - The stream to capture
time - The time in milliseconds to capture the stream
Throws:
MPlayerException - Thrown if their is a problem with mplayer
